items.sentence: Neither Tom nor Mary has been given a warning.
Neither Tom nor Mary has been asked to resign.
Tom asked Mary to tell John what he had to do.
Tom asked Mary to pick John up at the station.
Tom asked Mary to ask John why he'd done that.
Tom asked Mary to check to see if John was OK.
Tom and Mary worked together for three months.
Tom and Mary used to live near John and Alice.
Tom and Mary traveled together for a few days.
Tom and Mary seemed to be having a lot of fun.
Tom and Mary live next door to John and Alice.
Everyone but me seemed to know how to do that.
There are no published studies on this matter.
I haven't been to the doctor's in a long time.
I'm going to ask Tom if he can do that for us.
We went early to make sure we could get seats.

We all knew that gold was heavier than silver.
I opened my suitcase and started unpacking it.
I noticed a new set of footprints in the snow.
Tom said he thought there was no life on Mars.
Tom wants his son to learn how to read French.
I didn't tell Tom what we were planning to do.
Tom opened the bathroom door without knocking.
Tom used dry moss as tinder to start the fire.
Tom lived on the same small farm all his life.
Tom hasn't been here in the last three months.
Tom needs to come to grips with what happened.

Tom needs to know Mary isn't going to do that.
